action_details: For this emergency response, we will assign 4 doctors to ensure adequate care for the 3 injured individuals. Given the high severity of the incident and its electrical fire type, our team will focus on stabilizing any life-threatening conditions and providing supportive care as needed. The doctors will be allocated as follows: 2 for immediate trauma assessment and stabilization (1 with advanced life support skills), 1 for wound management and potential surgical interventions if required, and 1 to provide overall coordination and leadership in the response effort. The medical team will work closely with fire department personnel to ensure a safe environment for patient care and transport.
